lyrics.text:
‘Ei ‘o ‘emau mo’ui,
Kuo tō ni ‘a e po’uli
Hāngai ‘o foaki mai
Ki he ngāue kuo mau fai
Ha’
o
tāpu’aki.
‘Ei Māfimafi
Tali ‘emau hū:
‘Eiki Koe ‘o Natula,
Sātai ai pē ko e Fe’unga
Mo aoniu.

Loto fakapo’uli ē:
Mate fakalaumālie:
‘Eiki ē, fanongo mai
Hanga ‘o fofonga ai
‘O fakamaama.
‘Ei Māfimafi, etc.

Loto ē ka fu’u vaivai,
‘I he fetakai kuo fai:
‘Eiki, ‘omi ha tokoni:
Hifo ha’a ne tāpuaki.
‘O fakamālohi
‘Ei Māfimafi, etc.

Fakafiemālie pē ā.
Loto ‘ena fu’u hoha’a:
Tamai, fa’ē, kāinga ē
Tangi ‘ofa’anga mole.
‘E! Fakanonga.
‘Ei Māfimafi, etc.

Holomui si’i loto ē
Folofua ‘a e tauhele:
‘Eiki ē tokoni ā,
‘Ofa ki he angahala
‘O fakafoki:
‘Ei Māfimafi, etc.

Pea ka ‘osi ‘a e mo’ui ni,
Mate mo e fu’u po’uli;
‘Eiki, ke mau ‘ahoia;
Nofo langilangi’ia
‘I Hēvani.
‘Ei Mafimafi,
Tali ‘emau hü;
‘Eiki Koe ‘o Natula,
Sātai ai pē ko e Fe’unga
Mo aoniu. *
J.E.M. Jnr.
